description:
All season running and walking and in some areas off-leash dog friendly areas.  The attached GPS file is just a sample of the routes in the area.
There are 4 trails here and they can be combined for more or even less distance than the specified 5km.
For more info see:
http://www.ci.la.ca.us/RAP//dos/parks/facility/runyonCanyonPk.htm
http://www.ci.la.ca.us/rap/dos/parks/griffithPK/ 
http://www.griffithobs.org/
directions: Various places to access the area, it can be from the Griffith Observatory, from Runyon Canyon Park, or from Bronson Canyon and the famous sign.
title: Hollywood Hills - 4 Trails
